body.p: In their ebook, Social Media Marketing Playbook (Getting to First Base) ebookSocial Media Marketing Playbook, Darren Barefoot and Julie Szabo, JulieSzabo believe that technical writers are excellent blog monitors and can easily handle multiple notifications from reading multiple news feeds or RSS subscriptions. If the technical writer is also maintaining a blog and online presence, communitieslistening to conversations incommenting on others’ blogs in the field is a great way to join the conversationslistening toconversationsfollowing through syndicationconversation, but blogscommenting oncommenting on blogs moves into the participation phase.
Tools for listening are subscription tools such as RSS feed readers, GoogleAlertsGoogle Alerts, searchin Twittersearch.twitter.com, TechnoratiTechnorati, and Yahoo Pipes.
Another way to listen is to spend a day with technical support listening to their calls. This literal listening exercise can be eye opening if you’ve never spent a day on the customer line before.
If your product is sold on a website like amazon.com, you can also find conversations in the reviews, review comments, and blog entries.
